message.scwarfarebridge.already_in_natio: You are already in a nation. Leave it first.
message.scwarfarebridge.not_in_nation: You are not in a nation.
message.scwarfarebridge.no_permission: You do not have permission to do this.
message.scwarfarebridge.nation_name_take: A nation with that name already exists.
message.scwarfarebridge.name_too_short: Nation name must be at least 3 characters.
message.scwarfarebridge.name_too_long: Nation name must be at most 24 characters.
message.scwarfarebridge.invite_received: You have been invited to join %s! Use /nation accept <nation> to join.
message.scwarfarebridge.no_invite: You do not have a pending invite to that nation.
